summary: Have The Power Of The Giants In Your Hands
descriptionHtml:
The Space Hammer

This Hammer Has The Power Of The Giants.
When U Hit Someone With It It Will Create A Lot Of Dust And Debris.
And When Health Is Low, Will Send Your Enemies Into Space.

\'\'A Note Of Warning: Do Not Use In Walled Cities Or Indoors\'\'

Because Walled Cities Are Different Cells Than When You Are Standing On The Outside Wall In The Tamriel Cell, The NPC Will Fly Over The Wall And You Will Never Be Able To Reach Them.

And Do Not Use Indoors Because Well, See Picture Below.

http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/17403-4-1337526826.jpg

Put The File In The Skyrim Data Folder

How To Add: 

Press The Key Under Esc (The Tilde Key ~)
Type player.additem 10000d64 1

(Replace The Frist 2 Numbers With The Load Number That The Mod Is When U Installed It)

Exit Console Menu

UPDATE: A Craftable Version

It Can Now Be Crafted At The Skyforge
You Need The Ebony Smithing Perk
author: JP0005
